Module org.redsox.lancastersfx
Package org.redsox.lancastersfx.DatabaseConnectivity

Class DishDBConnectivity

java.lang.Object
org.redsox.lancastersfx.DatabaseConnectivity.ConnectivityDBImpl
org.redsox.lancastersfx.DatabaseConnectivity.DishDBConnectivity
public class DishDBConnectivity extends ConnectivityDBImpl
The DishDBConnectivity class extends ConnectivityDBImpl and provides methods for interacting with dishes and their related recipes in the database.
